text: HMA Gaffar is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Khulna-5. ==Career== Gaffar was elected to parliament from Khulna-5 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1986 and 1988. Gaffar is a veteran of Bangladesh Liberation war. He retired as a lieutenant colonel from Bangladesh Army. He is member of the Central University of Science and Technology trustee board. He was awarded Bir Uttom for gallantry. == Death == Gaffar died on 12 April 2020 in Combined Military Hospital. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:2020 deaths Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Recipients of the Bir Uttom Category:Mukti Bahini personnel Category:Bangladesh Army officers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: HMA Gaffar
